length

Class Meter

  • java.lang.Object
    • length.Length
      • length.Meter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Length>

    public class Meter
extends Length
    This subclass of Length represents the length supplied in the constructor in meters.
    Author:
    Haley, K.
